trans-unit.source: Delete a file from a compute node
trans-unit.target: Delete a file from a compute node

trans-unit.source: Delete a file from a compute node
trans-unit.target: Delete a file from a compute node

trans-unit.source: Deletes the specified task file from the compute node.
trans-unit.target: Deletes the specified task file from the compute node.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="0e07b9cb-8fdf-4ff7-b707-e964200df0f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to task files.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="0e07b9cb-8fdf-4ff7-b707-e964200df0f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to task files.

trans-unit.source: Replace {job-id} with the id of the job and {task-id} with the id of the task.
trans-unit.target: Replace {job-id} with the id of the job and {task-id} with the id of the task.

trans-unit.source: Replace {file-path} with the path to the task file that you want to delete.
trans-unit.target: Replace {file-path} with the path to the task file that you want to delete.

trans-unit.source: Replace {pool-id} with the id of the pool that contains the node and {} with the id of the node from which you want to delete the file.
trans-unit.target: Replace {pool-id} with the id of the pool that contains the node and {} with the id of the node from which you want to delete the file.

trans-unit.source: Replace {file-path} with the path to the file that you want to delete.
trans-unit.target: Replace {file-path} with the path to the file that you want to delete.

trans-unit.source: If the file-path parameter represents a directory instead of a file, you can set the optional recursive parameter to true to delete the directory and all of the files and subdirectories in it.
trans-unit.target: If the file-path parameter represents a directory instead of a file, you can set the optional recursive parameter to true to delete the directory and all of the files and subdirectories in it.

trans-unit.source: If recursive is false then the directory must be empty or deletion will fail.
trans-unit.target: If recursive is false then the directory must be empty or deletion will fail.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="e9da2d54-053a-4392-a5ba-26229c7cc9a5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="e9da2d54-053a-4392-a5ba-26229c7cc9a5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.
